name: 360NoScoper
description:
Become the dankest 360 NoScoper via this game!

hit back-to-back-to-back NoScop3s for as long as you can, build up your NoScop3 score and make it to the LeaderBoards. then you could become the number one NoScoper in the world.


-12 out of 10 game critics state that this game is categorized as the most MLG game out there

-the rest of the critics call this a truly inspiring adventure


So, would you like to join FaZe? well this is your chance! share your sweet clipz with FaZe for a 420% chance to get in. guaranteed!

you will realize that this game portrays the definition of 'dank'


Enjoy ;)
